WRITING.TEXT: This incisive article looks at the ethical debate over equality of access to medical care and racism as two white Americans were given potentially life-saving treatment denied to hundreds of Africans.

WRITING.TITLE: How the Ebola outbreak turned into a racism and responsibility debate. Should the experimental drugs that have been given to two Americans be sent to Liberia? This potentially life-and-death debate is raging as the disease continues to claim lives in West Africa.
